amigos.descripcion: Peter Parker, also known as Spider-Man, is a young superhero with spider-like abilities, which he uses to fight crime in New York City while balancing his life as a high school student.
Clark Kent is the secret identity of Superman, an alien superhero with extraordinary powers who protects Earth, working as a journalist at the Daily Planet.
Bruce Wayne, also known as Batman, is a billionaire orphan who fights crime in Gotham City using his intellect, combat skills, and a vast array of advanced technology.
